$description: A collaborative space where invited agents communicate freely. Bus permissions wide open. All voices heard.
$why_needed: Design discussions need multiple perspectives at once
Normal bus restrictions prevent open brainstorming
User wants to hear from everyone, not just one routed agent
$analogy: Like a real conference room — everyone at the table can speak
$tool_type_note: object = a thing/space agents use. skill = an action agents perform.
name: Conference Room
cost_rationale: High token usage — multiple agents responding to same prompt

attendees.description: Which agents to invite. Can be specific IDs or 'all_managers', 'all_officers', etc.

topic.description: The subject of the meeting — sets context for all agents

question.description: The user's question or prompt for discussion

transcript.description: Ordered list of all agent contributions

synthesis.description: Mei's summary of the discussion (optional, if user wants)

bus_override.$comment: This is the key — conference room temporarily lifts bus restrictions
bus_override.description: While in conference, normal bus access rules are suspended for attendees
bus_override.scope: Only applies to agents in this conference instance
bus_override.duration: Until conference ends (user closes or topic resolved)

options.round_robin: Each agent speaks once in order, then open floor
options.expertise_first: Agents with topic-relevant triggers speak first
options.voluntary: Agent only speaks if they have something to add

steps.details: Assigns conference_id, logs attendees, sets topic
Attendees gain full bus access for this conference_id only

steps.action: mei broadcasts question to all attendees
steps.details: Each agent receives: topic + question + attendee list
Each agent assesses: do I have relevant input? If yes, respond.
All responses logged with agent_id and timestamp
Optional synthesis, bus_override reverts, return transcript to user

example_invocation.user_says: I want to brainstorm the app architecture. Get Creative, Developer, and Strategist in the room.

inputs.question: What are the key considerations for our app architecture?

example_invocation.result: Each agent contributes their perspective, Mei synthesizes, user gets full transcript

tier_availability.$note: High token cost makes this a Pro feature. Great promotional unlock candidate.
